hackathon-description-text: OHacks is a 12 hour event where high school students work together in teams (of up to 4 students) to design, build, and pitch an app to judges. Meet tons of people, make something cool in 12 hours, get some free schwag! OHacks is open to all experience levels, whether this is your first time coding or your hundredth. We can't wait to
hackathon-eligibility: Any high schooler who is attending HSHacks can submit a progect! You can choose to work individually. A team can have a max of 4 people.
hackathon-requirements: Make your product, submit it to ChallengePost and attend the product fair to show off what you built and to be judged. Make sure to include the platforms and APIs you used in your hack. Also include a description of your project.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: $10 Movie Gift Cards to Regal Cinemas

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winners for best iOS app by Make School
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Office hours with Make School Founders

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=5263 Broadway Terrace, Oakland, CA 94618, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Your project is a new and thought out idea
Your project has potential to have a positive impact on the world
Your project shows excellent use of computer science knowledge
Your project considers all users in your design
You are able to completely present your project in one minute
